UBS key4 mortgages

UBS key4 mortgages

Description

UBS key4 mortgages is a crowdfunding platform based in Switzerland that specializes in P2P lending for the mortgage industry. Founded in 2019, the platform offers a user-friendly online service that allows individuals and businesses to compare mortgage prices in real-time. The website, available in English, German, Italian, and French, provides a transparent and efficient way for users to find mortgage options that cater to their specific needs. Whether it is for personal or corporate purposes, UBS key4 mortgages welcomes investors and borrowers alike. With a minimum investment requirement of just 1 EUR, the platform aims to make investing in real estate more accessible to a wider audience. While the advertised return is not mentioned, the platform emphasizes its commitment to helping users find competitive mortgage rates that meet their financial goals. UBS key4 mortgages aims to facilitate a seamless experience for investors, providing a range of options and information needed to make informed investment decisions. The platform's user-friendly interface and comprehensive mortgage comparison tools make it easy for investors to navigate and evaluate various mortgage products. Overall, UBS key4 mortgages provides an innovative solution for investors looking to participate in P2P lending in the mortgage industry. With a focus on transparency and customized solutions, the platform aims to empower users to make well-informed decisions that suit their unique financial requirements.

Who can invest

Impact investing is one of the emerging yet steady trends in the crowdfunding sector. It’s becoming increasingly widespread for investors to be interested not only in the possible returns but the collateral social or environmental impact. In other words people want their investment choices to be aligned with their values.

UBS key4 mortgages

LendInvest

United Kingdom

LendInvest is a crowdfunding platform based in the United Kingdom that specializes in peer-to-peer lending in the real estate and mortgages industry. Founded in 2008, LendInvest has quickly become a prominent online platform that offers property finance and innovative solutions for property developers, brokers, and investors. The platform has a strong track record, having lent over £2 billion since its launch. While the specific advertised return is not provided, LendInvest offers attractive investment opportunities in the real estate sector. Individual investors can join LendInvest with a minimum investment of £5,000, allowing individuals with varying capital levels to participate in the platform and benefit from its real estate and mortgage investments. LendInvest is known for its user-friendly website, which provides detailed information and resources for investors looking to diversify their portfolios through real estate lending. The platform offers a range of investment options and works to match investors with suitable projects. With its focus on the UK property market, LendInvest provides investors with the opportunity to participate in this lucrative industry. By providing accessible and straightforward investment options, LendInvest has become a trusted platform for both experienced and novice investors. Overall, LendInvest offers an attractive crowdfunding platform for individuals looking to invest in the UK real estate and mortgage sector. Its strong track record, minimum investment requirement, and focus on user experience make it an appealing choice for investors of different backgrounds and experience levels.

Industry:Real estateMortgages
Type:P2P lending

HNW Lending

United Kingdom

HNW Lending is a peer-to-peer (P2P) crowdfunding platform based in the United Kingdom. It specializes in asset-based lending within various industries such as real estate, SMEs, mortgages, and maritime. The platform was founded in 2013 and has been facilitating loans for over eight years. HNW Lending has established itself as a trusted and reliable platform, having arranged more than 450 loans, totaling over £115 million to date. The company's website is available in English, ensuring accessibility for a wider audience. Investors on HNW Lending can be individuals, corporates, ISAs (Individual Savings Accounts), or pension funds. The platform allows investors to participate in P2P lending by providing a minimum investment amount of 10,000 EUR. A key feature that sets HNW Lending apart is the Directors' first loss position in all loans. This means that the Directors of HNW Lending Ltd bear the initial risk in case of default, providing an added layer of security for investors. HNW Lending strives to deliver attractive returns to its investors, with an advertised return rate of 0.12. This indicates a potentially profitable investment opportunity for those seeking to diversify their portfolios in the real estate, SME, mortgages, or maritime sectors. With its extensive experience, reputable track record, and diverse investment options, HNW Lending offers individuals and organizations the opportunity to participate in P2P lending within the United Kingdom's thriving crowdfunding market.

Industry:Real estateSMEMortgagesMaritime
Type:P2P lending

Bona Fides Invest

Croatia

Any individual or organization from around the world can invest through Bona Fides Invest. The platform offers a wide range of investment types including equity, debt, P2P lending, reward-based crowdfunding, donation-based crowdfunding, and mini-bonds. Bona Fides Invest caters to multiple industries, making it suitable for investments in real estate, startups, small and medium enterprises (SMEs), sustainability projects, litigation funding, green energy initiatives, health and science ventures, logistics projects, personal loans, art campaigns, mortgages, social causes, education, farming, sports, and maritime ventures. Established in 2014 and based in Croatia, Bona Fides Invest has a user-friendly website that provides information in multiple languages, including Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, and Swedish. With a minimum investment of just 1 EUR, Bona Fides Invest aims to make crowdfunding accessible to a wide range of investors, from individuals to institutions. The platform offers an advertised return of 0.04. In summary, Bona Fides Invest is an EU-based fintech platform that facilitates crowdfunding for individuals and organizations worldwide. With its diverse range of investment options and industry presence, it offers opportunities for investors to support and fund projects in various sectors.

Industry:Real estateStartupsSMESustainabilityLitigationGreen energyHealth & ScienceLogisticsPersonal loansArtMortgagesSocial causeEducationFarmingSportMaritime
Type:EquityDebtP2P lendingRewardDonationMini-bonds

FinoMark

Lithuania

FinoMark is a crowdfunding platform based in Lithuania that offers P2P lending opportunities for various industries including real estate, startups, small and medium enterprises (SMEs), green energy, logistics, and mortgages. Founded in 2019, FinoMark aims to streamline the funding process and provide a more efficient and value-added solution for both fundraisers and investors. The platform is available in both English and Lithuanian languages, making it accessible to a wider range of users. FinoMark has a minimum investment requirement of 25 EUR, allowing individuals and corporations to participate in P2P lending. FinoMark advertises a return of 0.11, indicating the potential return on investment for participating in crowdfunding campaigns on the platform. This return rate may vary depending on the specific projects and investments made. The main focus of FinoMark is to help businesses achieve their financial goals by connecting them with investors interested in funding their projects. Through the platform, fundraisers can access capital from a diverse pool of investors, while investors can explore various investment opportunities and diversify their portfolio. Overall, FinoMark provides a user-friendly crowdfunding platform that enables both personal and corporate investors to participate in P2P lending for a range of industries, ultimately facilitating the growth and success of businesses in Lithuania. More information can be found on their website at https://www.finomark.lt/en/.

Industry:Real estateStartupsSMEGreen energyLogisticsMortgages
Type:P2P lending
